Quick Specifications Reference

Pitch Range
0.8-2.54mm
Micro to standard
Wire Gauge
AWG 32-14
UL-certified
Positions
2-24 pins
Custom available
MOQ
100 pcs
Prototypes welcome

Compatible Connector Brands

JST Series

SH, GH, PH, XH, EH, VH, ZH equivalents

Molex

Micro-Fit, PicoBlade, KK, Mini-Fit equivalents

TE Connectivity

AMP, Econoseal, and other series equivalents

Trycay

Professional terminal wire assembly manufacturer by Shenzhen Youboda Technology Co., Ltd. Specializing in precision crimped assemblies for JST, Molex, and TE compatible connectors.
